pr_title: [DOCFIX]  Add instructions for Presto versions with support for SDS

timeline.message: Add different instructions for Presto versions that include support for the catalog service

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be worded by 332 and above or 333 and above depending on which is true. This applies to 0.232 as well.
timeline.author: gpang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -213,7 +213,13 @@ and additions in the UDB tables.
 
 ## Using Alluxio Structured Data with Presto
 
-The Alluxio Catalog Service is built to be used with the connector in Presto.
+PrestoSQL version above 332 and PrestoDB version above 0.232 has built-in support for the Alluxio Catalog Service in their hive-hadoop2 connector.

timeline.author: gpang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -249,6 +255,8 @@ Creating the `catalog_alluxio.properties` file means a new catalog named `catalo
 to Presto.
 Setting `connector.name=hive-alluxio` sets the connector type to the name of the
 new Alluxio connector for Presto, which is `hive-alluxio`.
+If you are using PrestoSQL version above 332 and PrestoDB version above 0.232, support for Alluxio Catalog Service is built into
